trans-unit.source: You can improve the performance of update-intensive, large databases by putting a database's log on a separate device, which reduces I/O contention.

seg-source.mrk: You can improve the performance of update-intensive, large databases by putting a database's log on a separate device, which reduces I/O contention.

target.mrk: You can improve the performance of update-intensive, large databases by putting a database's log on a separate device, which reduces I/O contention.

trans-unit.source: By default, the transaction log is in the <codeph>log</codeph> subdirectory of the database directory. Use either of the following methods to store this <codeph>log</codeph> subdirectory in another location:

seg-source.mrk: By default, the transaction log is in the <codeph>log</codeph> subdirectory of the database directory.
Use either of the following methods to store this <codeph>log</codeph> subdirectory in another location:

target.mrk: By default, the transaction log is in the <codeph>log</codeph> subdirectory of the database directory.
Use either of the following methods to store this <codeph>log</codeph> subdirectory in another location:

trans-unit.source: Specify the non-default location by using the logDevice=logDirectoryPath attribute on the database connection URL when you create the database.

seg-source.mrk: Specify the non-default location by using the logDevice=logDirectoryPath attribute on the database connection URL when you create the database.

target.mrk: Specify the non-default location by using the logDevice=logDirectoryPath attribute on the database connection URL when you create the database.

trans-unit.source: If the database is already created, move the log manually and update the <codeph>service.properties</codeph> file.

seg-source.mrk: If the database is already created, move the log manually and update the <codeph>service.properties</codeph> file.

target.mrk: If the database is already created, move the log manually and update the <codeph>service.properties</codeph> file.
